Player History
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off LaMarr Hoyt (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1985, off Mario Soto (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/1985, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Injured on 8/29/1986 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/15/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Injured on 4/8/1989 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 6/19/1989...
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/24/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Released by New York (Y) on 3/3/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 3/3/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Traded from Pittsburgh to New York (Y) on 7/12/1990 (Going to PIT: RF Matt Winters. Going to NYY: 2B Tom Herr)...
7/27/1990: Signed a contract extension with New York (Y), $1,820,000 per year, for 2 years.
